name: Presto Starto
description:
Out now on iOS and Google Play Store! Please check these out if you want to play on mobile!

A fast paced reaction game from FISH MUG GAMES (Sean Rugg and Tom Cheshire)

See that button? Press it! See that toilet? Flush it! 

The long arm of ‘switching things off’ is approaching. Perform as many correct actions as you can until the lights go out!

With almost 70 randomly chosen levels, Presto Starto is the ultimate power fantasy for people who fantasise about powering things on. What are you waiting for? There’s no time to lose. Hurry up and Presto Starto!

Programming by Tom Cheshire

Art, music and additional programming by Sean Rugg
